lines: When I was younger, I dreamed of becoming a Swan Knight of Dol Amroth. Those times seem far away now.
I hope that my family shall not be conscripted into the levies of Gondor.
Truly, these days are the failing of the race of Men. It seems even my crops are failing.
There's some troubling news going around. I can tell you that much.
We do what we can to survive, #p. But if the Enemy comes, we will not be able to do much.
Our crops have been failing, #p. I hope for better fortune next year.
The heroes of Gondor shall rise to protect us, #p.
I must return to work, #p. Those fields won't till themselves.
I shall not bore you with old tales of the village.
Which village do you come from, #p?
I am your true friend, #, as long as you stand true for Gondor.
Are you one of the heroes of Gondor? Have you come to protect us?
Hail, #p, come from afar to win glory for Gondor!
You're no friend of mine, #p.
You're a villain!
Get out of my sight, #p.
You're a nasty piece of work, #p.
Away with you!
Our people have no love for villains like you!
The heroes of Gondor will strike you down, #p.
You belong in the stocks, #p!
Don't look at me like that.
What do you want from me, you scoundrel?
We have no love for people of your sort.
You're a ne'er-do-well, #p, that's for sure.
Run along, #p, else I'll call the guards on you.
You shall get no welcome here.
You'd best be careful around here. It's not safe for criminals like you.
Leave Gondor while you still can, #p.
I suggest you leave this place, #p.
You'd be best to leave, #p. Or would you rather be forced out?
Off with you, #p! We don't welcome ne'er-do-wells in Gondor.
